name: api_audio_AudioSource
description: A representation of audio sources in 3D.

properties.name: bypassEffects
properties.description: Bypass effects (Applied from filter components or global listener filters).

properties.name: bypassListenerEffects
properties.description: When set, global effects on the AudioListener doesn't apply to the audio signal generated by the AudioSource. It also does'nt apply, if the AudioSource is playing into a mixer group.

properties.name: bypassReverbZones
properties.description: When set, it doesn't route the signal from an AudioSource into the global reverb associated with reverb zones.

properties.name: clip
properties.description: The default AudioClip to play.

properties.name: dopplerLevel
properties.description: Sets the Doppler scale for this AudioSource.

properties.name: gamepadSpeakerOutputType
properties.description: Gets or sets the gamepad audio output type for this audio source.

properties.name: generator
properties.description: The default IAudioGenerator to play next.

properties.name: generatorInstance
properties.description: A handle to the currently playing Generator, if it can be controlled by scripting.

properties.name: ignoreListenerPause
properties.description: Allows AudioSource to play even though AudioListener.pause is set to true. This is useful for the menu element sounds or background music in pause menus.

properties.name: ignoreListenerVolume
properties.description: This makes the audio source not take into account the volume of the audio listener.

properties.name: isPlaying
properties.description: Returns whether the AudioSource is currently playing an AudioResource(Read Only).

properties.name: isVirtual
properties.description: True if all sounds played by the AudioSource, such as main sound started by Play() or playOnAwake, and one-shots are culled by the audio system.

properties.name: loop
properties.description: Checks if the audio clip is looping

properties.name: maxDistance
properties.description: The distance where sound either becomes inaudible or stops attenuation, depending on the rolloff mode.

properties.name: minDistance
properties.description: Within the Min distance the AudioSource will cease to grow louder in volume.

properties.name: mute
properties.description: Un- / Mutes the AudioSource. Mute sets the volume=0, Un-Mute restore the original volume.

properties.name: outputAudioMixerGroup
properties.description: The target group to which the AudioSource should route its signal.

properties.name: panStereo
properties.description: Pans a playing sound in a stereo way (left or right). This only applies to sounds that are Mono or Stereo.

properties.name: pitch
properties.description: The pitch of the audio source.

properties.name: playOnAwake
properties.description: Enable this property to automatically play the audio source when the component or GameObject becomes active.
